net.jforum.entities

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jforum.entities.Topic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Topic
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents every topic in the forum.
    Author:
    Rafael Steil
